item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - SAINT SEIYA 聖闘士星矢 OS CAVALEIROS DO ZODÍACO SOUNDTRACK [FLAC/MP3] — THE LOST CANVAS / ETERNAL CD-BOX "CLASSIC" / BRAZIL / MORE...
item.description:
NOTE: ALMOST all files in FLAC 16 BIT / 44.1 kHz. However, some albums are in MP3 320K / 44.1 kHz.
*** These are albums that I collected from the internet (alternative sources), so the quality is that provided by the original uploaders (not me) -- without exaggerated guarantees.

NOTE: ALGUNS albuns podem estar em MP3 320K / 44.1 kHz. Veja infos para mais identificá-los.
*** Estes são alguns albuns que eu consegui pela internet há algum tempo (de fontes diversas), então, a qualidade é fornecida pelos publicadores originais (não eu!) -- sem exigências exageradas.

Enjoy it! ^_~
Aproveite! ^_~

item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】iTunes Plus - Ariana Grande - eternal sunshine | 16bits/44.1kHz | ACC M4A (with 5 different covers) + MP3
item.description:
Ariana Grande - eternal sunshine

Released: 03/08/2024
Genre: Pop
Source: Puchased on Itunes Store


Tracklist

1. intro (end of the world)
2. bye
3. don't wanna break up again
4. Saturn Returns Interlude
5. eternal sunshine
6. supernatural
7. true story
8. the boy is mine
9. yes, and?
10. we can't be friends (wait for your love)
11. i wish i hated you
12. imperfect for you
13. ordinary things (feat. Nonna)
​
Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
​
item.author: sunfloweronly
